message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go down to $120 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $130, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand that $130 is as high as you're willing to go, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to get this deal done. I'll meet you at $132.50. It's still a great deal for both of us, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $132.50. I'm willing to go up to $129.50, that's the best I can do. Can you meet me there?

I understand that $129.50 is the best you can do, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to get this deal done. I'll meet you at $129.00. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I think it's still a fair deal for both of us.
I think we're getting close, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $128. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Can you accept that price?
